message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's flip the script.  I'm offering you 40% and keeping 60%.
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is still a good deal!
My offer remains the same - 60/40. I believe it's a fair deal, and I'm not budging.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I won't go below 56-44!
I'm willing to increase my share slightly, but I'm holding firm to my principle of a 65/35 split. Let's reach an agreement before things get worse for both of us.
I'm starting to feel the pinch of inflation, let's settle on 54-46 before it's too late!
Alice, the inflation is hurting us both.  Let's cut our losses and agree to a 70/30 split.  It's the best we can do at this point.
